review: It works and it is very simple to install. My wife uses it for Netflix, almost exclusively, and some YouTube, so I cannot opine on other channels (does it work with Amazon PrimeTime? Don't know, haven't checked). The form factor is excellent; no problem finding space for it in the back of the TV. I installed in HDMI 1, and it's just a follow-the-instructions exercise. Once operational, very fault-tolerant. We really enjoy it.
